title: 怎样防御1.6.2版本的NBT攻击
txt_content:
怎样防御1.6.2版本的NBT攻击，具体版本:spigot-1.6.2-R2.0-SNAPSHOT，最近我的服老被攻击，冒出来一堆报错，都是关于NBTTagCompound，报错如下

01.01 23:26:11 [Server] INFO at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_6_R2.util.AsynchronousExecutor$Task.init(AsynchronousExecutor.java:150)
01.01 23:26:11 [Server] INFO at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_6_R2.chunkio.ChunkIOProvider.callStage1(ChunkIOProvider.java:13)
01.01 23:26:11 [Server] INFO at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_6_R2.chunkio.ChunkIOProvider.callStage1(ChunkIOProvider.java:19)
01.01 23:26:11 [Server] INFO at net.minecraft.server.v1_6_R2.ChunkRegionLoader.loadChunk(ChunkRegionLoader.java:75)
01.01 23:26:11 [Server] INFO at net.minecraft.server.v1_6_R2.NBTCompressedStreamTools.a(SourceFile:75)
01.01 23:26:11 [Server] INFO at net.minecraft.server.v1_6_R2.NBTBase.a(SourceFile:89)
01.01 23:26:11 [Server] INFO at net.minecraft.server.v1_6_R2.NBTBase.b(SourceFile:101)
01.01 23:26:11 [Server] INFO at net.minecraft.server.v1_6_R2.NBTTagCompound.load(NBTTagCompound.java:41)
01.01 23:26:11 [Server] INFO at net.minecraft.server.v1_6_R2.NBTBase.b(SourceFile:101)
01.01 23:26:11 [Server] INFO at net.minecraft.server.v1_6_R2.NBTTagCompound.load(NBTTagCompound.java:41)
01.01 23:26:11 [Server] INFO at net.minecraft.server.v1_6_R2.NBTBase.b(SourceFile:101)
01.01 23:26:11 [Server] INFO java.lang.NullPointerException


是否有解决办法，求各位大触来解决

replies.txt_content: 好吧，不是nbt攻击，求解怎样解决  加载的时候遭遇到空指针的nbt
